resources.string: Membership of the gym is valid for a half year period, being terminated feb. 28th and aug. 31st. Membership price is 200dkk per half year, and must be renewed by payment at termination dates. Click button to sign up.

Membership of the music room is valid for a half year period. Being terminated on jun. 30th and dec. 31st. The membership price is 100dkk for a single person for a period, and 200dkk for a band. Membership renewal happens on renewed payment at termination dates.
